title: Traditional Country Star's Girlfriend Speaks Out Against Internet Backlash: 'I'm Human' - NewsBreak

Since going public about her romance with the country artist, she has dealt with online hate and criticism, including death threats. However, instead of letting things fester, Taylor has chosen to face internet trolls head-on to set the record straight about made-up stories that others have said about her. On Monday, July 21, Taylor took to TikTok, sharing a video that found her in a seated position outdoors, feeding a kangaroo. I think I learn something new about myself on here every day. I didnâ€™t meet my boyfriend when I was in high school.â€ Later on in her post, Taylor further reiterated that neither death threats nor suicide wishes should ever be made toward another individual, but added that sheâ€™s perfectly OK with not being everybodyâ€™s cup of tea. â€œDisliking another human is fine! According to People , Taylor and Top made their relationship public in Nov. 2024 via TikTok, walking the red carpet at the 58th Annual CMA Awards. Taylor, a native of Mississippi, is a model and a social media influencer. She has also competed in pageants, including 2021 Miss Mississippi Teen USA.
